title: Bolivia : internet penetration 2000 to 2017
summary: In general Percentage of individuals using internet has rose over the Year.

Percentage of individuals using internet is slightly increasing from 2000 to 2002, roughly constant from 2002 to 2006, slightly increasing from 2006 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, and finally slightly increasing from 2008 to 2011.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Percentage of individuals using internet, of value 30.0 was reached at Year 2011
The lowest Percentage of individuals using internet, of value 1.44 was reported at Year 2000
